mapper.select: select * from DOG_GATHER_POST_TB where DELETED = 0 order by ID desc
select * from DOG_GATHER_POST_TB where REGION_ID=#{REGION_ID} and DELETED = 0 and GATHERING_DATE > sysdate
select region.id from user_tb member, region_tb region where member.id=#{id} and substr(#{address},0,2) = region.region_name

SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM (SELECT post.id, region.region_name, species.dog_species, dog_size.dog_size, post.title, member.username, member.nickname FROM dog_gather_post_tb post, user_tb member, region_tb region, dog_species_tb species, dog_size_tb dog_size WHERE
post.id > 0 and post.deleted=0 and post.user_id = member.id and post.region_id = region.id and post.species_id = species.id and species.size_id = dog_size.id )
select * from DOG_GATHER_POST_TB where ID = #{ID} and DELETED = 0
select ID from USER_TB where USERNAME=#{USERNAME}
select ID from USER_TB where NICKNAME=#{NICKNAME}
select ID from DOG_SPECIES_TB where DOG_SPECIES=#{DOG_SPECIES}
select DOG_SPECIES from DOG_SPECIES_TB where ID=#{ID}
select SIZE_ID from DOG_SPECIES_TB where ID=#{ID}
select USERNAME from USER_TB where ID=#{ID}
select NICKNAME from USER_TB where ID=#{ID}
select count(*) from DOG_GATHER_PERSON_TB where POST_ID=#{POST_ID} and USER_ID=#{USER_ID} and CANCELED=0
select count(ID) from DOG_GATHER_PERSON_TB where POST_ID=#{POST_ID} and CANCELED = 0
select ID from REGION_TB where REGION_NAME=#{REGION_NAME}

select person.id, person.user_id, person.request_content, person.post_id, member.username, member.nickname, species.dog_species from dog_gather_person_tb person left join user_tb member on person.user_id = member.id left join dog_species_tb species on person.species_id = species.id where person.post_id = #{POST_ID} and person.canceled = 0 order by person.id
mapper.update: update DOG_GATHER_POST_TB set VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT+1 where ID = #{ID} and DELETED = 0
update DOG_GATHER_PERSON_TB set CANCELED=1 where ID=#{ID} and POST_ID=#{POST_ID}
update DOG_GATHER_PERSON_TB set CANCELED=1 where POST_ID=#{POST_ID}
update DOG_GATHER_POST_TB set DELETED=1 where ID=#{ID}
